Im a God in this Game
CSGO is a great game. I think everyone should play it.

This game is a good classic fps (first person shooter). The game may seem pretty basic , however you really need to master the mechanics in order to reach the highest ranks. 
The graphics are perfect as it looks good on multiple computers and does not require a beast setup in order to run. 
Obviously the community in this game is terrible.You will experience a lot of toxic , smurf , racist players .
 A LOT OF HACKERS/ CHEATERS/SCRIPTORS.
The reason i would recommend this game is because of how enjoyable it is with friends. It offers multiple game modes where it can get competitive. Or you could surf/bhop and play hide and seek to chill.
One of the funnest games I have played. Sad thing is I bought it and like 2 weeks after it went free to play but it was still worth it. (kinda)
